import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Navigate } from 'react-router'; import './signup.css'; const Signup = () => { // Adding hooks const [firstName, updateFirstName] = useState(""); const [lastName, updateLastName] = useState(""); const [age, updateAge] = useState(0); const [email, updateEmail] = useState(""); const [password, updatePassword] = useState(""); const [address, updateAddress] = useState(""); const [gender, updateGender] = useState(""); const formHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Perform loginForm operation... const reqBody = JSON.stringify({ firstName, lastName, age, email, password, address, gender }); const options = { method: 'POST', 'content-type': 'application/json', body: reqBody } fetch("/signUpForm", options) .then(response => { response.json(); }) .then(res => { console.log(res); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }); } if (localStorage.getItem('token')){ return } else { return (

updateFirstName(e.target.value)} placeholder="First Name" required />
updateLastName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Last Name" required />
updateAge(e.target.value)} placeholder="Age" />
updateEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="Email" required />
updatePassword(e.target.value)} placeholder="Password" required />
updateAddress(e.target.value)} placeholder="1234 Main St" />
updateGender("male")} type="radio" name="gender" value="male" checked />
updateGender("female")} type="radio" name="gender" value="female" />

); } } export default Signup;
